title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!

title: Casting News: Deborah Norville Exits Inside Edition, Days of Our Lives Departure and More
description: Deborah Norville is saying goodbye to Inside Edition after 30 years as anchor of the syndicated newsmagazine. Norville announced her exit during this Wednesday’s episode, revealing that her tenure at Inside Edition, which she joined in 1995, will conclude at the end of this season. “They made me a lovely offer to stay, but there […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: La La Anthony Comedy Group Chat Gets Pilot Order at Hulu
description: La La Anthony, whose TV credits over the past decade alone include Power, BMF and The Chi, is ready to be a lot less serious, as the star of a comedy. Our sister site Deadline reports that as but one part of a first-look deal that reality-TV vet/actress Kim Kardashian has signed with 20th Television, […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Alert: MPU Needs to Do More Than Kill off a Lead to Improve
description: Alert: MPU lost a series lead last night, but it's going to take a lot more to right this ship than to reevaluate the status of the leads. The post Alert: MPU Needs to Do More Than Kill off a Lead to Improve appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Carissa Pavlica

title: CBS Made a Mistake By Cancelling the Most Thrilling FBI Show
description: CBS decided to pull the plug on both scripted FBI spinoffs but the cancellation of FBI: Most Wanted is a mistake for them. The post CBS Made a Mistake By Cancelling the Most Thrilling FBI Show appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Denis Kimathi
